findings.title: Missing Content-Security-Policy Header
findings.description: The Content-Security-Policy header is missing. Helps prevent Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) and data injection attacks.
findings.evidence: No Content-Security-Policy header was found in the response
findings.remediation:
Implement a strong Content-Security-Policy that restricts sources of executable scripts, objects, frames, etc.. Suggested value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'self'; form-action 'self'; base-uri 'self'; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self';

Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/CSP

findings.title: Missing X-Content-Type-Options Header
findings.description: The X-Content-Type-Options header is missing. Prevents MIME type sniffing.
findings.evidence: No X-Content-Type-Options header was found in the response
findings.remediation:
Set X-Content-Type-Options to 'nosniff'. Suggested value: nosniff

Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/X-Content-Type-Options

findings.title: Missing X-Frame-Options Header
findings.description: The X-Frame-Options header is missing. Prevents clickjacking attacks.
findings.evidence: No X-Frame-Options header was found in the response
findings.remediation:
Set X-Frame-Options to 'DENY' or 'SAMEORIGIN'. Suggested value: DENY

Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/X-Frame-Options

findings.title: Missing Strict-Transport-Security Header
findings.description: The Strict-Transport-Security header is missing. Ensures the browser only connects to the server over HTTPS.
findings.evidence: No Strict-Transport-Security header was found in the response
findings.remediation:
Set Strict-Transport-Security with max-age of at least 31536000 (1 year) and include subdomains. Suggested value: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload

Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Strict-Transport-Security

findings.title: Missing X-Xss-Protection Header
findings.description: The X-Xss-Protection header is missing. Enables browser's built-in XSS filtering.
findings.evidence: No X-Xss-Protection header was found in the response
findings.remediation:
Set X-XSS-Protection to '1; mode=block'. Suggested value: 1; mode=block

Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/X-XSS-Protection

findings.title: Missing Referrer-Policy Header
findings.description: The Referrer-Policy header is missing. Controls how much referrer information is included with requests.
findings.evidence: No Referrer-Policy header was found in the response
findings.remediation:
Set Referrer-Policy to 'no-referrer' or 'strict-origin-when-cross-origin'. Suggested value: strict-origin-when-cross-origin

Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Referrer-Policy

findings.title: Missing Permissions-Policy Header
findings.description: The Permissions-Policy header is missing. Controls which browser features and APIs can be used in the document.
findings.evidence: No Permissions-Policy header was found in the response
findings.remediation:
Implement a Permissions-Policy to restrict access to sensitive features like camera, microphone, geolocation. Suggested value: camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=(), interest-cohort=()

Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Permissions-Policy

findings.title: Missing Feature-Policy Header
findings.description: The Feature-Policy header is missing. Controls which browser features and APIs can be used in the document.
findings.evidence: No Feature-Policy header was found in the response
findings.remediation:
Implement a Permissions-Policy to restrict access to sensitive features like camera, microphone, geolocation. Suggested value: camera 'none'; microphone 'none'; geolocation 'none'; interest-cohort 'none'

Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Permissions-Policy

findings.title: Suboptimal Cache-Control Header
findings.description: The Cache-Control header is present but not configured optimally for security. Controls how pages are cached by browsers and proxies.
findings.remediation:
For sensitive pages, set Cache-Control to 'no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, max-age=0'. Current value: max-age=618
Suggested value: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, max-age=0

Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Cache-Control
